hioa.android.chess

Class PlayerFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • RelativeLayout
      • hioa.android.chess.PlayerFrame

  • public class PlayerFrame
extends RelativeLayout
    A view that contains a player's name, clock, captured pieces and provides info on the game state(in check etc)
    Version:
    2013-11-23
    Author:
    Lars Sætaberget

      • addBefore

        private boolean addBefore(Chesspiece piece,
                Chesspiece currentPiece)
        Help method to determine if the piece should be added before currentPiece in the list
        Parameters:
        piece - The piece to add
        currentPiece - The piece that was jsut iterated
        Returns:
        True if the piece should be added here

      • addPiece

        public void addPiece(Chesspiece piece)
        Adds a captured piece to the list and displays it in order:
        Pawn - Knight - Bishop - Rook - Queen
        Parameters:
        piece -

        Sets the imageviews to display the contents of the list

      • getDrawable

        private BitmapDrawable getDrawable(int id,
                         int sizeId)
        This method returns the drawable found at id, resized to fit inside a tile.
        Parameters:
        id - The image resource id
        Returns:
        The image found by the resource id resized to fit inside an imagebutton in this view

      • getIcon

        private Drawable getIcon(Chesspiece piece)
        Gets the icon for this piece
        Parameters:
        piece - The piece who's icon to retrieve
        Returns:
        A drawable scaled to fit inside the imageViews

        Sets the large info text for this view based on the provided flag
        Parameters:
